verses.verse: <S%H1945>Woe<s%> to them that <S%H2803>devise<s%> <S%H205>iniquity,<s%> and <S%H6466>work<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> on their <S%H4904>beds!<s%> when the <S%H1242>morning<s%> is <S%H216>light,<s%> they <S%H6213>practice<s%> it, <S%H3588>because<s%> it is in the <S%H410>power<s%> of their <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

And they <S%H2530>covet<s%> <S%H7704>fields,<s%> and <S%H5375>take<s%> them by <S%H1497>violence;<s%> and <S%H1004>houses,<s%> and <S%H5375>take<s%> them <S%H7726>away:<s%> so they <S%H6231>oppress<s%> a <S%H1397>man<s%> and his <S%H1004>house,<s%> even a <S%H376>man<s%> and his <S%H5159>heritage.<s%>

<S%H3651>Therefore<s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> <S%H2005>Behold,<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H4940>family<s%> do I <S%H2803>devise<s%> an <S%H7451>evil,<s%> from <S%H834>which<s%> you shall not <S%H4185>remove<s%> your <S%H6677>necks;<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall you <S%H3212>go<s%> <S%H7317>haughtily:<s%> for <S%H1931>this<s%> <S%H6256>time<s%> is <S%H7451>evil.<s%>

In that <S%H3117>day<s%> shall one <S%H5375>take<s%> up a <S%H4912>parable<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> you, and <S%H5091>lament<s%> with a <S%H5093>doleful<s%> <S%H5092>lamentation,<s%> and <S%H559>say,<s%> We be <S%H7703>utterly<s%> <S%H7703>spoiled:<s%> he has <S%H4171>changed<s%> the <S%H2506>portion<s%> of my <S%H5971>people:<s%> <S%H349>how<s%> has he <S%H4185>removed<s%> it from me! <S%H7725>turning<s%> away he has <S%H2505>divided<s%> our <S%H7704>fields.<s%>
<S%H3651>Therefore<s%> you shall <S%H1961>have<s%> <S%H3808>none<s%> that shall <S%H7993>cast<s%> a <S%H2256>cord<s%> by <S%H1486>lot<s%> in the <S%H6951>congregation<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
<S%H5197>Prophesy<s%> you not, say they to them that <S%H5197>prophesy:<s%> they shall not <S%H5197>prophesy<s%> to them, that they shall not <S%H5253>take<s%> <S%H3639>shame.<s%>

O you that are <S%H559>named<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> is the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7114>straitened?<s%> are <S%H428>these<s%> his <S%H4611>doings?<s%> do not my <S%H1697>words<s%> do <S%H3190>good<s%> to him that <S%H1980>walks<s%> <S%H3477>uprightly?<s%>

Even of <S%H865>late<s%> my <S%H5971>people<s%> is <S%H6965>risen<s%> up as an <S%H341>enemy:<s%> you <S%H6584>pull<s%> off the <S%H145>robe<s%> with the <S%H8008>garment<s%> from them that <S%H5674>pass<s%> by <S%H983>securely<s%> as men <S%H7725>averse<s%> from <S%H4421>war.<s%>

The <S%H802>women<s%> of my <S%H5971>people<s%> have you <S%H1644>cast<s%> out from their <S%H8588>pleasant<s%> <S%H1004>houses;<s%> from their <S%H5768>children<s%> have you <S%H3947>taken<s%> away my <S%H1926>glory<s%> for <S%H5769>ever.<s%>

<S%H6965>Arise<s%> you, and <S%H3212>depart;<s%> for <S%H2063>this<s%> is not your <S%H4496>rest:<s%> <S%H5668>because<s%> it is <S%H2930>polluted,<s%> it shall <S%H2254>destroy<s%> you, even with a <S%H4834>sore<s%> <S%H2256>destruction.<s%>

<S%H3863>If<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H1980>walking<s%> in the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> and <S%H8267>falsehood<s%> do <S%H3576>lie,<s%> saying, I will <S%H5197>prophesy<s%> to you of <S%H3196>wine<s%> and of <S%H7941>strong<s%> <S%H7941>drink;<s%> he shall even be the <S%H5197>prophet<s%> of <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people.<s%>

I will surely <S%H622>assemble,<s%> O <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> of you; I will surely <S%H6908>gather<s%> the <S%H7611>remnant<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> I will <S%H7760>put<s%> them <S%H3162>together<s%> as the <S%H6629>sheep<s%> of <S%H1224>Bozrah,<s%> as the <S%H5739>flock<s%> in the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of their <S%H1699>fold:<s%> they shall make great <S%H1949>noise<s%> by reason of the multitude of <S%H120>men.<s%>

The <S%H6555>breaker<s%> is <S%H5927>come<s%> up <S%H6440>before<s%> them: they have <S%H6555>broken<s%> up, and have <S%H5674>passed<s%> through the <S%H8179>gate,<s%> and are <S%H3318>gone<s%> out by it: and their <S%H4428>king<s%> shall <S%H5674>pass<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> them, and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> on the <S%H7218>head<s%> of them.
